document_data.name: ''Saboteur's Stiletto''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Saboteur's stilettos''''' were [[enchanted]] [[dagger]]s created to be used in assassination and subterfuge.
document_data.Description: This [[bronze]] [[stiletto]] was covered in a never depleting coat of bubbling [[acid]].
document_data.Powers: The blade was unaffected by its acid, remaining shining and sharp. The weapons possessed a ''+1'' enchantment and burned its targets with acid upon contact.
document_data.History: In the {{yearlink|1374}}, a ''saboteur's stiletto'' was wielded by a [[yuan-ti pureblood]] agent [[Luaire Farwander]] of [[House Se'Sehen]]. The spy used the dagger against a group of [[adventurer]]s hired by [[Sa'Sani]], the leader of one of [[Samargol]]'s merchant companies. The stiletto was taken off Luaire Farwander's dead body.
